body_html: Has there been any movement in this issue? I'm very interested in seeing how binary networks can be trained using tensorFlow. I have studied the work of Courbariaux and played a bit with his implementations (specifically BinaryConnect) but my final goal would be to have XNOR-Net running with tensorFlow.

body: Has there been any movement in this issue? I'm very interested in seeing how binary networks can be trained using tensorFlow. I have studied the work of Courbariaux and played a bit with his implementations (specifically BinaryConnect) but my final goal would be to have XNOR-Net running with tensorFlow.
